newsitem.title: GERMANY: SOCCER-GERMANY'S EILTS TO MISS WORLD CUP QUALIFIER.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-GERMANY'S EILTS TO MISS WORLD CUP QUALIFIER.

text.p: Germany's defensive midfielder Dieter Eilts will miss Saturday's World Cup qualifier against Northern Ireland due to a knee injury.
Eilts travelled to Munich on Thursday to see a specialist, officials at the European champions' training camp said.
Bayern Munich midfielder Mehmet Scholl is also doubtful for the group nine match in Nuremberg because of an ankle injury.
